title: Add OAuth2 authentication support
body:
This PR adds OAuth2 authentication support to the API.

## Summary
Implements OAuth2 bearer token authentication for secure API access.

## Changes
- New `auth.py` module with authentication logic
- New `/api/v1/user` endpoint to get current user info
- Integration with Flask request headers for token validation

## Fixes
- Fixes #123 (Security: Add OAuth2 support)
- Closes #456 (Feature request: Authentication)
Related to JIRA-789

## Testing
Added comprehensive tests in `tests/test_auth.py`

cc @reviewer
